attributes.action: to ban the sale of fireworks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the prime minister should ban all sale of fireworks and have the local council hold a neighbourhood fireworks display, this would stop fireworks from being sold to under age children and would cut down on the amount of noise we have to put up with animals being scared pensioners being scared everyone being woken up in the early hours to the sound of fireworks being let off,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
